title: Website won't let me post or create a discussion on normal boards
body:
Hi, this account is level 6 on NA servers  and I planned on using it on the roleplaying boards, however despite being a level over the requirement for said board it is not allowing me to post, comment or reply

Please help me

replies.body: Sometimes an account needs to sync with the boards when posting for the first time, and it can take a little bit of time.  It still shows that your account is level 3, but I tried to force a sync to see if that can help.  Give it a little bit and relog, hopefully you'll sync up in no time!
